languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single ranged attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single ranged attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this round.

Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single ranged attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者在战斗中首次使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击击杀目标时，装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}立刻获得一次额外攻击。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者在战斗中首次使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击击杀目标时，装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}立刻获得一次额外攻击。

languages.text: Убив цель одиночной дистанционной атакой впервые за бой, персонаж немедленно получает дополнительную атаку в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single ranged attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Убив цель одиночной {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой впервые за бой, персонаж немедленно получает дополнительную атаку в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}.
Убив цель одиночной {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционной{/g} атакой впервые за бой, персонаж немедленно получает дополнительную атаку в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘中初めて1回の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃でターゲットを倒した時、その{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で即座に追加攻撃を得る。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中初めて1回の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃でターゲットを倒した時、その{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で即座に追加攻撃を得る。

languages.text: Cuando el portador mata a un objetivo con un solo ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} por primera vez en combate, obtiene inmediatamente un ataque adicional en este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador mata a un objetivo con un solo ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} por primera vez en combate, obtiene inmediatamente un ataque adicional en este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger ein Ziel zum ersten Mal im Kampf mit einem einzigen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g} tötet, erhält der Träger diese {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} sofort einen zusätzlichen Angriff.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger ein Ziel zum ersten Mal im Kampf mit einem einzigen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}angriff tötet, erhält der Träger diese {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} sofort einen zusätzlichen Angriff.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine une cible à l'aide d'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} ponctuelle pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, il bénéficie immédiatement une attaque supplémentaire utilisable lors du même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine une cible à l'aide d'une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} ponctuelle pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, il bénéficie immédiatement une attaque supplémentaire utilisable lors du même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
